MS MCQs

    Updates and upgrades for Finance and Operations apps

    »

    1. What is the output of the code upgrade during an AX 2012 upgrade to Finance and Operations?

      The fit/gap analysis report and code analysis

      Migration summary report, including customization information and the Task list report

      Upgrade analysis and code analysis


    2. In which version do you use the Data Migration Tool (DMT) to upgrade to the latest version of Finance and Operations?

      Upgrading from AX 2012 to Finance and Operations

      Upgrading from 8.0 to version 10 for Finance and Operations

      Upgrading from AX 2009 to Finance and Operations
